description:
Visit my Amazon affiliated links to pick up the Gluegun:
Surebonder Gluegun: https://amzn.to/2smsqZV
Surebonder nozzle assortment: https://amzn.to/2kDBDsH
Great gluestick deal: https://amzn.to/2LOJCzF

Check out the great colored gluesticks at the Surebonder website: https://surebonder.com/

Learn to make Grey Ooze monsters for all your miniature 28mm tabletop games such as Dungeons and Dragons and Pathfinder. This easy craft will save you valuable time, so you have more hours to play the games you love. The materials are also cheap and easy to obtain so this project wonâ€™t break your budget. Bring a few crafting tools and sit down with DM Scotty to begin your DIY crafting adventure. You can find the tools you need at my website ( http://www.thedmscraft.com/ ). So grab your gluegun and Go Forth and Craft.

For more information on DM crafting visit my website:
http://www.thedmscraft.com/

Get cheap crafting stuff at the Dollar Tree (My affiliated link): http://www.shareasale.com/u.cfm?d=434929&m=64888&u=1701826

The Tabletop Crafters Guild Site:
http://www.tabletopcraftersguild.com/

Become a friend to the Craft and help me bring more content to the community by joining my Patreon. You will have access to exclusive DM Scotty content:  https://www.patreon.com/theDMsCraft?ty=h

Join The Tabletop Crafters Guild Facebook group for more crafts and camaraderie. 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmscottyscraftsngames/

Twitter: @TheDMsCraft
title: Easy to Make GREY OOZE Minis for D&D (DM's Craft Short Tip #112)
